alert.note: Alert for Orange; Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 06 at 2:43PM EST until March 07 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Orange and Windsor Counties. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 4 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong southwesterly downslope wind gusts are expected on the eastern slopes of the Green Mountains this evening into the first half of tonight behind a cold frontal boundary crossing between 6 PM and 8 PM.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
